root.name: dist()
root.description: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points (considering a point as a vector object).

parameter.label: v
parameter.description: PVector: the x, y, and z coordinates of a PVector object

parameter.label: v1
parameter.description: PVector: the x, y, and z coordinates of a PVector object

parameter.label: v2
parameter.description: PVector: the x, y, and z coordinates of a PVector object
